meanings.definition: To arrange excessively or in an excessive manner.
meanings.sent1: She overarranges her desk with too many decorations.
meanings.sent2: He always overarranges his schedule, making it hard to keep up.
meanings.sent3: The party planner overarranges the balloons, making it look like a circus.
meanings.sent4: Her perfectionism leads her to overarrange every detail, like a conductor orchestrating a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The chef overarranges the ingredients on the plate, creating a visually stunning dish.
